Unicron:

"Start with the attack, my children"said Unicron"Let them know th=
e true extention of our power!!!!"


From: supercyclonus 
Sent: Thursday, F=
ebruary 11, 2010 4:46 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: The Time Has =
Come!


  
Standing on a small island on a lonely outcropping in the midst =
of the growing archipelago that would one day be called Hawaii A dark figur=
e stood. Ash and smoke billowed around him as the ground rumbled dangerousl=
y. 

"Marauder, Report!" came an imperious voice over his internal coms. 

=
"Yes, I am here commander." came the reply, Marauder's voice deep and yet e=
loquent. Even as he spoke it was if the still figured was returning to life=
. Winglike protrusions that attached to his back ruffled slightly as his fo=
rmed straightened and went from menacing to more majestic for a moment. "Wh=
at are your orders Lord Vorpral?" he continued, his voice almost aristocrat=
ic for a moment. 

"You are to assume command of the minion, and you are to=
 report to leader Unicron, and he will give you orders." Came General Vorpr=
al's voice over the channel. "You are ready for our conquest!"

With a simp=
le nod Marauder leaped into the air, his form shifting and contorting until=
 he assumed a rather fearsome looking starfighter! 

With a burst of power =
that rivaled the heat and fury of the volcanic eruptions around Marauder ri=
pped into the skies above, a flaring fire into an already red sky. 

"My Lo=
rd!" Marauder opened a channel to the world destroyer known as Unicron as h=
e continued his skyward lift. "I await your command. The time has come!"

<=
